Buckwheat porridge with milk and berries.title: Buckwheat Porridge with Milk and Berries
instructions: Rinse buckwheat well
Toast buckwheat in a dry pan for 2-3 minutes
Add water and salt, bring to boil
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes
Add milk, simmer for another 5 minutes
Remove from heat, stir in butter and honey
Let stand for 5 minutes
Serve warm topped with fresh berries
Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired

Oatmeal with honey and nuts.title: Oatmeal with Honey and Nuts
instructions: Bring milk or water to a boil in a saucepan
Add oats, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 5 minutes
Stir in cinnamon and salt
Remove from heat, add honey and butter
Top with chopped nuts and fresh berries
Serve hot

Fried eggs with bread.title: Fried Eggs with Bread
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Optional: fresh herbs (dill, parsley), tomatoes, pickles
instructions: Heat butter or oil in a large pan over medium heat
Crack eggs into the pan, being careful not to break yolks
Season with salt and pepper
Cook for 2-3 minutes until whites are set but yolks are still runny
For over-easy, flip carefully and cook for another 30 seconds
Toast bread until golden
Serve eggs on toast or on the side
Garnish with fresh herbs if desired
Accompany with tomatoes or pickles for a complete meal

Syrniki (cottage cheese pancakes).title: Syrniki (Cottage Cheese Pancakes)
ingredients: Fresh berries or jam for topping
instructions: Mash cottage cheese in a bowl
Add eggs, sugar, salt, and vanilla, mix well
Gradually add flour until mixture holds together
Form small patties with damp hands
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat
Fry syrniki for 3-4 minutes per side until golden brown
Drain on paper towels
Serve hot with sour cream and berries or jam

Blini with cheese filling.title: Blini with Cheese Filling
ingredients: Filling: 300g cottage cheese or farmer's cheese, 1 egg, 2 tbsp sour cream, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp vanilla
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and salt in a bowl
Whisk eggs and milk together, add to dry ingredients
Add melted butter, whisk until smooth batter forms
Let batter rest for 15 minutes
Heat a non-stick pan, lightly butter it
Pour small ladle of batter, swirl to make thin pancake
Cook for 1-2 minutes per side until golden
For filling: mix cottage cheese, egg, sour cream, sugar, and vanilla
Spread filling on blini, roll up
Serve with sour cream and berries

Kasha with butter and milk.title: Kasha (Buckwheat) with Butter and Milk
instructions: Rinse buckwheat well, drain
Toast buckwheat in a dry pan for 2-3 minutes until fragrant
Add water or broth and salt, bring to boil
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes
Remove from heat, let stand covered for 5 minutes
Fluff with a fork
Stir in butter
Serve warm, optionally with milk on the side
Can also be served with fried onions or mushrooms

Scrambled eggs with vegetables.title: Scrambled Eggs with Vegetables
instructions: Heat butter in a large pan over medium heat
Sauté onions and peppers until softened
Add tomatoes and spinach, cook until wilted
Beat eggs with salt and pepper
Pour eggs over vegetables
Gently stir and fold eggs until set but still moist
Add cheese if using, stir briefly to melt
Garnish with fresh herbs, serve immediately

Apple slices with cheese.title: Apple Slices with Cheese
ingredients: 150g cheese (Gouda, cheddar, or any firm cheese)
instructions: Wash and slice apples
Slice cheese into thin pieces or cubes
Arrange apple and cheese on a plate
Drizzle with honey if desired
Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired
Top with nuts for crunch
Serve immediately

Yogurt with honey.title: Yogurt with Honey
instructions: Spoon yogurt into a bowl
Drizzle honey over yogurt
Top with fresh berries
Sprinkle granola over the top
Add cinnamon for extra flavor
Garnish with nuts
Serve immediately

Nuts and dried fruits.title: Nuts and Dried Fruits
instructions: Mix nuts and dried fruits in a bowl
Drizzle with honey if desired for extra sweetness
Sprinkle with cinnamon for extra flavor
Serve as a snack
Store in an airtight container

Cottage cheese with herbs.title: Cottage Cheese with Herbs
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Place cottage cheese in a serving bowl
Add sour cream and mix lightly
Stir in minced garlic
Add chopped fresh herbs
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Drizzle with olive oil if desired
Serve on toast or with vegetables

Banana with peanut butter.title: Banana with Peanut Butter
instructions: Peel bananas and slice or leave whole
Spread peanut butter on bananas or use as dip
Drizzle with honey
Sprinkle with cinnamon
Top with granola or nuts if desired
Serve immediately

Pickled vegetables.title: Pickled Vegetables
instructions: Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces
Combine vinegar, water, sugar, and salt in a saucepan
Heat until sugar and salt dissolve
Add garlic, dill seeds, and bay leaf
Place vegetables in a clean jar
Pour the hot brine over the vegetables
Cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours
Serve chilled as a side dish or snack

Ryebread with butter.title: Ryebread with Butter
ingredients: 4 slices ryebread or whole grain bread
instructions: Toast bread if desired
Spread butter generously on each slice
Sprinkle with salt to taste
For garlic bread: rub with a cut garlic clove
For herb butter: mix herbs into softened butter first
Serve with cheese if desired
Best served fresh

Chicken soup with vegetables.title: Chicken Soup with Vegetables
instructions: Place chicken in a large pot with water or broth
Bring to boil, skim any foam
Reduce heat, simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is cooked
Remove chicken, shred when cool
Add vegetables to the pot, simmer for 15 minutes
Return shredded chicken to the pot
Add garlic and herbs, season with salt and pepper
Simmer for another 5 minutes
Serve hot with fresh bread

Borscht with sour cream.title: Borscht with Sour Cream
instructions: If using meat, boil beef for 1-2 hours, remove and cube
Add potatoes to broth, cook for 10 minutes
In a separate pan, sauté onions and carrots
Add beets, tomatoes, tomato paste, simmer for 10 minutes
Add to the pot along with cabbage, garlic, bay leaves, and peppercorns
Simmer for 15-20 minutes until all vegetables are tender
Add vinegar for brightness, season with salt
Return meat to pot if using, heat through
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream and fresh dill

Beef stroganoff with rice.title: Beef Stroganoff with Rice
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Season beef with salt and pepper, sear in butter until browned, set aside
In the same pan, sauté onions and mushrooms until soft
Add garlic, cook for 1 minute
Sprinkle flour, stir to coat
Add beef broth, bring to simmer and cook for 5 minutes
Return beef to pan, stir in sour cream and mustard
Simmer gently for 2-3 minutes until sauce thickens
Serve over rice, garnished with parsley

Pelmeni with sour cream.title: Pelmeni with Sour Cream
ingredients: For homemade dough: 200g flour, 1 egg, 50ml water, salt
For homemade filling: 300g ground pork, 100g ground beef, 2 onions, salt, pepper
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Add frozen pelmeni (or fresh if homemade)
Cook for 7-10 minutes until they float
Drain well
For homemade: make dough, roll thin, cut circles, add meat filling, seal edges
Serve hot with a generous dollop of sour cream
Garnish with fresh dill
Season with salt and pepper to taste

Shashlik (grilled meat) with salad.title: Shashlik (Grilled Meat) with Salad
ingredients: 600g pork or lamb, cut into 3cm cubes
1 large bell pepper, cut into squares
Marinade: 1/2 cup kefir or yogurt, 2 tbsp vinegar, 1 tsp paprika, 3 garlic cloves, minced, salt and pepper
Salad: 200g cabbage, 1 carrot, 1 cucumber, 2 tbsp sour cream, dill, salt, pepper
instructions: Mix marinade ingredients, coat meat and vegetables, marinate for 2-4 hours
Thread meat, onions, and peppers onto skewers
Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high
Brush skewers with vegetable oil
Grill for 12-15 minutes, turning frequently, until charred and cooked through
For salad: shred cabbage, grate carrot, slice cucumber
Mix with sour cream, dill, salt, and pepper
Serve shashlik hot with salad on the side

Pasta carbonara.title: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil, cook pasta al dente
While pasta cooks, crisp pancetta in a large pan
Remove pancetta, leave fat in pan, rub with garlic cloves
In a bowl, whisk egg yolks, cheeses, and plenty of black pepper
Add 2-3 tbsp pasta water to egg mixture, whisk to loosen
Drain pasta, reserving pasta water
Add hot pasta to pancetta pan, toss briefly
Remove from heat, quickly add egg mixture, toss vigorously
Add more pasta water if needed for silky sauce
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

Cabbage rolls with meat.title: Cabbage Rolls with Meat
instructions: Boil cabbage whole, carefully peel leaves
Mix meats, rice, onion, garlic, egg, salt, and pepper
Place filling in each cabbage leaf, roll and tuck edges
Arrange rolls in a baking dish
Mix tomato paste with sauce, pour over rolls
Cover and bake at 180°C for 1 hour
Garnish with fresh dill
Serve hot with sour cream

Congee with egg and scallions.title: Congee with Egg and Scallions
ingredients: Salt and white pepper to taste
instructions: Rinse rice well, drain
Bring water or broth to boil, add rice and ginger
Reduce to low, simmer uncovered for 45-60 minutes, stirring occasionally
Congee is done when rice is completely broken down and creamy
Season with salt and white pepper
Poach eggs in boiling water for 3-4 minutes
Serve congee in bowls topped with a poached egg
Garnish with green onions, sesame oil, soy sauce
Add fried shallots and chili oil if desired

Steamed buns for pork.title: Steamed Buns with Pork (Char Siu Bao)
ingredients: Bun dough: 300g flour, 150ml warm water, 7g yeast, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp oil
Filling: 300g pork shoulder, minced, 3 tbsp hoisin sauce, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 2 tbsp sugar, 2 tbsp cornstarch, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1 scallion, minced
instructions: For dough: mix yeast with warm water and sugar, let sit 5 minutes
Mix flour, add yeast mixture and oil, knead until smooth
Let dough rise for 1 hour
For filling: mix pork with all sauce ingredients
Divide dough into 12 pieces, roll into circles
Place filling in center, pleat edges to seal
Place buns on parchment paper in a steamer
Steam for 12-15 minutes until puffy
Serve hot

Rice porridge with pickles.title: Rice Porridge with Pickles
ingredients: 100g pickled vegetables (kimchi, pickled radish, pickled cucumber)
instructions: Rinse rice well
Add water or broth and ginger to a pot, bring to boil
Add rice, reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes
Stir occasionally, add more water if needed
Rice should be very soft and porridge-like
Season with salt and soy sauce
Fry eggs sunny-side up
Serve porridge in bowls topped with fried egg
Serve pickles on the side
Garnish with green onions and sesame oil

Fried rice with vegetables.title: Fried Rice with Vegetables
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat
Scramble eggs, remove from pan and set aside
Add more oil, stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant
Add bell pepper and mixed vegetables, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes
Add rice, break up any clumps
Add soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper
Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until everything is heated through
Return eggs to the pan, toss to combine
Garnish with green onions
Serve hot

Miso soup with tofu.title: Miso Soup with Tofu
ingredients: 1.2L dashi stock (or water with dashi powder)
instructions: Bring dashi stock to a simmer (don't boil)
Add tofu cubes, simmer for 1-2 minutes
Remove a small amount of hot stock and dissolve miso paste in it
Add dissolved miso back to the pot (don't boil after adding miso)
Heat through, about 1 minute
Ladle into bowls
Garnish with green onions and nori strips
Serve immediately

Rice noodles with egg.title: Rice Noodles with Egg
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, drain
Beat eggs with 1 tbsp soy sauce
Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs, set aside
Add more oil, stir-fry garlic until fragrant
Add noodles, remaining soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until noodles are coated
Add bean sprouts, toss briefly
Return eggs to the pan, toss to combine
Garnish with green onions and cilantro
Serve hot

Dim sum dumplings.title: Dim Sum Dumplings
ingredients: Filling: 200g ground pork, 100g shrimp, chopped, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 2 tbsp cornstarch, 1 scallion, minced, 1 tsp fresh ginger, grated
Dipping sauce: 3 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp rice vinegar, 1 tsp chili oil
instructions: For dough: mix flour and hot water, knead until smooth, rest for 30 minutes
For filling: mix all ingredients in a bowl
Divide dough into 24 pieces, roll into circles
Place filling in center, pleat edges to seal (gather at top)
Place dumplings in a steamer lined with parchment
Steam for 8-10 minutes until translucent
Mix dipping sauce ingredients
Serve hot with dipping sauce

Edamame with sea salt.title: Edamame with Sea Salt
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Add edamame, boil for 5-6 minutes
Drain well
Toss with sea salt while still warm
Serve in a bowl with coarse salt for dipping
Squeeze pods to eat the beans inside
Discard the pods

Seaweed snacks.title: Seaweed Snacks
ingredients: Optional: additional seasonings (chili flakes, garlic powder)
instructions: Preheat oven to 150°C (300°F)
Cut nori sheets into smaller squares if desired
Brush lightly with sesame oil
Sprinkle with sea salt and any additional seasonings
Bake for 5-8 minutes until crispy but not burnt
Alternatively, enjoy pre-made roasted seaweed snacks
Store in an airtight container to maintain crispness

Rice crackers.title: Rice Crackers
instructions: Mix cooked rice with rice flour, water, and salt
Knead until smooth, form into small balls
Flatten each ball into a thin disc
Sprinkle with sesame seeds
Heat oil in a pan to 180°C
Fry rice crackers until golden and crispy
Drain on paper towels
Cool completely before storing
Store in an airtight container

Pickled ginger and daikon.title: Pickled Ginger and Daikon
instructions: Slice ginger into thin strips using a mandoline or sharp knife
Slice daikon into thin strips or matchsticks
Blanch daikon in boiling water for 30 seconds, drain
Combine vinegar, sugar, salt, and water in a saucepan
Heat until sugar and salt dissolve, then cool
Place ginger and daikon in a clean jar
Pour the cooled pickling liquid over the vegetables
Cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours
Store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks
Serve as a side dish or garnish

Mango slices.title: Mango Slices
instructions: Wash mangoes
Slice off each side of the mango, avoiding the large pit in the center
Score the flesh in a grid pattern without cutting through the skin
Press the skin-side up to push the cubes outward
Slice cubes off the skin
Arrange on a plate
Drizzle with lime juice
Optionally sprinkle with a pinch of chili powder for heat
Optionally drizzle with honey for extra sweetness
Serve immediately

Green tea cookies.title: Green Tea Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F)
Beat butter and powdered sugar until light and fluffy
Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well
Sift together flour, matcha powder, and salt
Gradually add dry ingredients to butter mixture, mix until just combined
Shape dough into a log, wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes
Slice into 0.5cm rounds, place on baking sheet
Bake for 12-15 minutes until edges are lightly golden
Cool on wire rack

Fried tofu cubes.title: Fried Tofu Cubes
instructions: Press tofu to remove excess water, then cut into 2cm cubes
Coat tofu lightly with cornstarch
Heat oil in a wok or pan over medium-high heat
Fry tofu cubes until golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes
Remove tofu and drain on paper towels
In the same pan, stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant
Add soy sauce, sesame oil, and green onions
Return tofu, toss to coat, season with salt and pepper
Serve hot

Chicken teriyaki with rice.title: Chicken Teriyaki with Rice
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar for teriyaki sauce
Heat oil in a pan, brown chicken pieces
Add teriyaki sauce, simmer until chicken is cooked through and sauce thickens
Remove from heat, stir in sesame oil
Serve chicken over rice
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds

Pad Thai with shrimp.title: Pad Thai with Shrimp
ingredients: 1 tbsp tamarind paste or 2 tbsp lime juice
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, drain
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste/lime juice, and sugar
Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs, set aside
Add more oil, stir-fry garlic
Add shrimp, cook until pink
Add noodles and sauce mixture, toss to coat
Add bean sprouts and green onions, toss briefly
Return eggs, toss to combine
Serve topped with crushed peanuts and lime wedges

Vietnamese pho.title: Vietnamese Pho
instructions: Char onion and ginger over open flame or in a dry pan
Bring beef broth to boil, add star anise, cinnamon, charred onion and ginger
Simmer for 30 minutes, strain
Cook rice noodles according to package, drain
Arrange noodles in bowls
Top with raw beef slices
Ladle hot broth over beef (cooks it)
Garnish with bean sprouts, green onions, basil, cilantro
Serve with lime wedges, fish sauce, and hoisin sauce on the side

Korean bibimbap.title: Korean Bibimbap
ingredients: Sesame seeds, sliced green onions for garnish
instructions: Season rice with sesame oil and soy sauce, set aside
Marinate beef with soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic
Stir-fry beef until cooked, set aside
Blanch bean sprouts and spinach separately, season with sesame oil and salt
Stir-fry carrots and zucchini separately, season
Fry eggs sunny-side up
Arrange rice in bowls
Arrange vegetables and beef on top in sections
Top each bowl with a fried egg
Serve with gochujang on the side
Mix everything together before eating

Sichuan mapo tofu.title: Sichuan Mapo Tofu
ingredients: 1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water
instructions: Cube tofu and set aside
Heat oil in a wok, brown pork
Add doubanjiang, black beans, garlic, and ginger
Stir-fry until fragrant
Add chicken broth and soy sauce, bring to simmer
Gently add tofu, simmer for 5 minutes
Add cornstarch slurry to thicken sauce
Stir in Sichuan peppercorns
Garnish with green onions
Serve hot over rice

Thai green curry.title: Thai Green Curry
ingredients: 1 tbsp palm sugar or brown sugar
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Heat a wok, add 1/4 cup coconut cream (the thick part from top of can)
Stir-fry curry paste until fragrant
Add protein, cook until almost done
Add remaining coconut milk, bell pepper, bamboo shoots, and eggplant
Simmer for 10 minutes until vegetables are tender
Season with fish sauce and sugar
Add Thai basil and kaffir lime leaf
Serve over jasmine rice

Japanese ramen.title: Japanese Ramen
ingredients: 150g chashu pork belly or other protein
instructions: Prepare broth: combine stock, soy sauce, and miso, simmer
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions, drain
Slice chashu pork and briefly warm in broth
Prepare soft-boiled eggs (6-7 minutes in boiling water)
Arrange noodles in bowls
Ladle hot broth over noodles
Top with pork, egg halves, bamboo shoots, bean sprouts
Garnish with green onions, nori sheets
Add sesame oil and chili oil to taste
Serve immediately while hot
